Information about the film

Title: Hercules : Starting legend
Original title : The Legend of Hercules
Year : 2014
Genre: Fantasy , Action
Issued: USA, Bulgaria , Millennium Films
Director: Renny Harlin
Starring: Kellan Lutz , Jaya Weiss , Scott Adkins , Roxanne McKee, Gerrigan Liam , Liam McIntyre , Rada Sherbedzhiya , Jonathon Shek , Luke Newberry , Kenneth Krenem

200 BC. e . Ancient Greece . Beautiful queen Alcmene fell under the spell of the terrible god of Olympus - Zeus and bore him a son of Hercules. At birth he was predicted to become the greatest warrior who will rule over the nations and bring peace and prosperity of his country. But while Hercules does not know anything about his destiny. He grew up beautiful and strong young man. He dreams of love princess of Crete , Hebe , which
 promised to marry his brother. When Hercules learns of his great mission , he must choose : to escape with his love or to fulfill his destiny . He will fight with the centaur , defeat giants grown from dragon's teeth , outwit goddesses of Fate save his beloved Hebe and go into battle with his worst enemy - the son of the god of war Ares.
